Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #Water Temple#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Small Key#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Small Key#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #ReDead in the Composers' Grave# guard #the Minuet of Forest#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Song of Storms# can be found at #Hyrule Castle#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Bottom of the Well# is on the way of the hero.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Desert Colossus# is on the way of the hero.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

HC (Malon).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #Forest Temple#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Mask of Truth# yields #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Desert Colossus# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# holds #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Small Key#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that plundering #Zora's River# is a foolish choice.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Small Key#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Gerudo Training Grounds# is on the way of the hero.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Prelude of Light#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Prelude of Light#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Bottom of the Well# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Left).text: They say that plundering #Deku Tree# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #a Hookshot# can be found at #Kakariko Village#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Small Key#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that the final prize of #the thieves' training# is #a Huge Rupee#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Pierre atop the Fire Temple# hides #a Blue Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that the #Mask of Truth# yields #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Small Key#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that scoring 1500 in #horseback archery# grants #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that shooting #the sun# grants #a Small Key#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Gerudo Training Grounds# is on the way of the hero.
